DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety tolerability multiple dose PF-05402536 PF-06413367 healthy adult smoker .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Safety Tolerability Different Doses PF-05402536 PF-06413367 Healthy Adult Smokers .
DOC.criteria: Current cigarette smoker Males females nonchild bear potential , minimum legal age smoking ( approximately 18 19 year , depend local jurisdiction ) 55 year , inclusive , motivate stop smoking . Subjects must smoke average least 10 cigarette per day past year month prior prescreening assessment entry , period abstinence great 3 month past year . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , neurologic disease may compromise ability safely participate study . Active suicidal ideation history suicidal behavior within past 5 year prior screen visit .
